title: Tornado Radial Watch Face
summary: Exquisite Watch face design for smartwatchLet the Tornado into your watch!

Let the Tornado into your watch!FREE Watch FaceSupported Watch Resolutions up to - 480pxThis app is fully compatible with the following watches :- LG Watch Urbane 2- Huawei Watch- Moto 360 2nd Gen- Samsung Galaxy Gear Live- LG G Watch- Motorola Moto 360- LG R watch- Asus Zen-watch- Sony smartwatch 3- Any other Android Wear WatchAfter install on your phone, the app automatically installs itself on the watch.
descriptionHTML:
Exquisite Watch face design for Android smartwatch.
Clean, stylish and fascinating. Let the Tornado into your watch!

FREE Watch Face

Supported Watch Resolutions up to - 480px

This app is fully compatible with the following watches :
- LG Watch Urbane 2
- Huawei Watch
- Moto 360 2nd Gen
- Samsung Galaxy Gear Live
- LG G Watch
- Motorola Moto 360
- LG R watch
- Asus Zen-watch
- Sony smartwatch 3
- Any other Android Wear Watch

After install on your phone, the app automatically installs itself on the watch.
comments: I love it, however I was disappointed that there was no 12-hour option. Other than that, great watch.
Good colorful basic face! Wish you could change time format, maybe see battery level. Very pretty and smooth.
I really need to see date, so it will be 5 stars if you enable us to make some modification.
A nice face Tornado looks great and works well.
Really attractive looking and fluid movement - it just needs some tap actions so you can see calendar, weather, steps, etc.  Keep working at it..!!  :-)
